definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
(arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth

sentences.english: Their franc is the most expensive currency on our list.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它們的瑞士法郎是我們列表中最貴的貨幣。

sentences.english: Price in Swiss Franc (CHF or SFr), Tax included.
Nestlé sales for 2010 were almost CHF 110 bn.
sentences.chinese: 雀巢2010年銷售總額將近110億瑞士法郎。

sentences.english: Fines are as much as 260 Swiss francs - and that for a first offense.
sentences.chinese: 罰款高達260瑞士法郎，而這還只是初犯的金額。

sentences.english: The Group posted sales of 45.6 billion Swiss francs.
sentences.chinese: 該集團銷售額達到了456億瑞士法郎。

sentences.english: This month, the franc hit a record high against the euro.
sentences.chinese: 本月，瑞士法郎對歐元的匯率創下新的記錄。

sentences.english: Swifty Xena Pro can extract uncompressed SWF files from executables.
sentences.chinese: 迅速出沒親能提取壓縮檔案瑞士法郎從可執行文件。

sentences.english: That puts pressure on market favourites like the Swiss franc and the yen.
sentences.chinese: 這使市場青睞的貨幣承受壓力，例如瑞士法郎和日元。

sentences.english: The Swiss franc is a hard currency.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士法郎是一種硬貨幣。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the Swiss franc - another popular haven currency - weakened against the euro.
sentences.chinese: 同時，另一種避險貨幣瑞士法郎對歐元走低。

definition: peso (currency in Latin America) (loanword)/also written 比索[bi3 suo3]
